page.title: 04Educational Establishments.
page.content: Within the D-Block are{two schools and a{College of Agriculture.}A small school existed in Ashorne until 1975. There is a large primary school in Wellesbourne which has about 350 pupils. { Moreton Morrell Church of England {(Aided) Junior and Infant School, serves the parishes of Moreton Morrell, Newbold Pacey and Ashorne. However, children from the neighbouring village of Lighthorne and a few children from Wellesbourne also attend, especially if their parents feel they would benefit from being at a Church of England school. At the time of the survey the school has 55 children on roll. Twenty eight are in the junior department (8-11 yrs.) and twenty seven infants (4-7 yrs.). There is a staff of two full time teachers and one part-time.
